abstract: After France said it would miss its deficit target again, officials highlighted the sacrifices some nations had made to get their finances in order.
snippet: After France said it would miss its deficit target again, officials highlighted the sacrifices some nations had made to get their finances in order.
lead_paragraph: MILAN — The rule book for the stability of the euro came under strain Friday at a meeting of finance ministers after France warned this past week that it would miss its deficit target again.

headline.main: Veiled Criticism for France as Ministers Stress Eurozone Stability
headline.print_headline: Veiled Criticism for France as Ministers Stress Eurozone Stability
